name: Old School Runescape
notes:
REQUIRES JAVA, also requires wmctrl and p7zip.
This installer downloads the mac version of OSRS, and extracts the cross-platform java files to run on linux.

execute.command: rm -Rf ~/'runescape/oldschool' '/tmp/oldschool' && mkdir -p ~/'runescape/oldschool' '/tmp/oldschool' && wget -O '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool.dmg' 'https://www.runescape.com/downloads/OldSchool.dmg' && 7z e -o'/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg' -y '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool.dmg' && cp '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg/jagexappletviewer.jar' ~/'runescape/oldschool/jagexappletviewer.jar' && cp '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg/OSRS.icns' ~/'runescape/oldschool/OSRS.icns' && rm -Rf '/tmp/oldschool' && sync

content:
game:
  command: cd ~/'runescape/oldschool' && java -Duser.home='.' -Djava.class.path='jagexappletviewer.jar'
    -Dcom.jagex.config='http://oldschool.runescape.com/jav_config.ws' 'jagexappletviewer'
    'oldschool'
installer:
- execute:
    command: rm -Rf ~/'runescape/oldschool' '/tmp/oldschool' && mkdir -p ~/'runescape/oldschool'
      '/tmp/oldschool' && wget -O '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool.dmg' 'https://www.runescape.com/downloads/OldSchool.dmg'
      && 7z e -o'/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg' -y '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool.dmg' &&
      cp '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg/jagexappletviewer.jar' ~/'runescape/oldschool/jagexappletviewer.jar'
      && cp '/tmp/oldschool/OldSchool-dmg/OSRS.icns' ~/'runescape/oldschool/OSRS.icns'
      && rm -Rf '/tmp/oldschool' && sync
